text:
I would think that I could go to the ant website and get
the *current* documentation, not documentation for a beta.
I think this was inconsiderate.
creator: gfowler@acm.org
antoine@apache.org
text:
This is now fixed.
The manual of ant 1.6.0 is available here :
http://ant.apache.org/manual/index.html

The manual of ant 1.6.1beta1 is available here :
http://ant.apache.org/manual-1.6.1beta1/
